userlogin: Sign in to start your session
resetPasswordInstructions: Enter your email address or phone number to receive a security code
connectionLostMessage: Oops! It looks like you've lost your internet connection. We'll automatically wait for the connection to be restored.
tip1: Check that your WiFi or mobile data is enabled
tip3: Move closer to your WiFi access point
tip4: Contact your Internet Service Provider if the problem persists
error400Message: The data sent to the server is incorrect or incomplete.
error401Message: You need to log in to access this resource.
error403Message: You don't have the necessary permissions to access this page.
error404Message: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.
error408Message: The request took too long. Please try again.
error429Message: You have made too many requests. Please wait before trying again.
error500Message: An error occurred on our servers. Our teams have been notified.
error502Message: The server received an invalid response. Please try again in a few moments.
error503Message: The service is temporarily unavailable. Maintenance in progress.
error504Message: The server did not respond in time. Please try again.
errorGenericMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
suggestion400_1: Check that you have filled in all required fields
suggestion400_2: Ensure the data is in the correct format
suggestion400_3: Contact support if the problem persists
suggestion401_2: Check that your session has not expired
suggestion403_1: Check that you have the necessary access rights
suggestion403_2: Contact your administrator to obtain access
suggestion403_3: Log in with an authorized account
suggestion404_2: Return to the home page and try again
suggestion404_3: Use the navigation menu to find what you're looking for
suggestion404_4: Contact us if you think this is an error
suggestion408_3: Contact support if the problem persists
suggestion429_1: Wait a few minutes before trying again
suggestion429_2: Reduce the frequency of your requests
suggestion429_3: Contact support if you need a higher limit
suggestion500_1: Try again in a few moments
suggestion500_2: Our technical teams have been notified
suggestion500_3: Contact support if the problem persists
suggestion502_2: Try again in a few minutes
suggestion502_3: The problem should resolve itself automatically
suggestion503_2: Try again in a few minutes
suggestion503_3: Check our status page for more information
suggestion504_3: Contact support if the problem persists
